firstNightReminder: The Cook chooses 2 players and learn how many of their neighbours are evil (0-4)
name: Cook
ability: During 1st night choose 2 players, you learn how many of their neighbours are evil.

firstNightReminder: During first night show the census worker the in-play good character.
name: Census Worker
ability: Demon bluffs have two in-play good characters. You start knowing one of them.

firstNightReminder: Show the Street Kid another Street Kid.
name: Street Kid
ability: You start knowing another Street Kid. Your vote is counted only if all living street kids vote. [+1 to +2 Street Kids]

firstNightReminder: Tell the Deputy an in-play townsfolk. On subsequent nights they wake right after the shown character.
name: Deputy
ability: You start knowing an in-play townsfolk: you have their ability until they die.

firstNightReminder: Crossword Lady points to a player, show them two characters this player isn't.
otherNightReminder: Crossword Lady points to a player, show them two characters this player isn't.
name: Crossword Lady
ability: Each night choose a player: you learn 2 characters they are not.

otherNightReminder: Wake the Journalist and tell them a true statement about last day or night.
name: Journalist
ability: Each night*, you learn a true statement about last night or day.

firstNightReminder: Wake the Contrarian and tell them a false version of information you provided/would provide to an in-play character. Do not elaborate on information.
otherNightReminder: Wake the Contrarian and tell them a false version of information you provided/would provide to an in-play character. Do not elaborate on information.
name: Contrarian
ability: Each night, you learn a false version of information learned or would be learned this night by another in-play character.

firstNightReminder: Drinking Buddy chooses a player, one of them is drunk, show the Drinking Buddy the character of chosen person (wrong if drunk)
otherNightReminder: Drinking Buddy chooses a player, one of them is drunk, show the Drinking Buddy the character of chosen person (wrong if drunk)
name: Drinking Buddy
ability: Each night, choose a player: you learn their character. Either you or they are drunk until dusk.

otherNightReminder: Night Guard chooses a player, when any of the chosen players are killed by the demon they die instead.
name: Night Guard
ability: Each night*, choose two players: if either of them is killed by the demon tonight you die instead.

firstNightReminder: Crossword Lady chooses a player and a character, the chosen player has ability of this character if they are not in play.
otherNightReminder: Crossword Lady chooses a player and a character, the chosen player has ability of this character if they are not in play.
name: Woodcarver
ability: Each night, choose a living player (not yourself) and a good character. If the character is not in play, they have that characters ability until dusk.

name: Dark Empath
ability: If one of your neighbours dies, the other dies too. [You neighbour one evil player and one good player].

name: Duelist
ability: Once per game publicly choose a player: you must play roshambo until there is a loser. The loser dies.

name: Demonologist
ability: Once per game publicly choose a player: the demon must choose this player tonight.

name: Village Elder
ability: Your vote is counted as 2 even if dead.

name: Deserter
ability: If you die your allighnment changes. [You might start evil.]

firstNightReminder: Gambler chooses a player if Demon chose this player the gambler dies.
otherNightReminder: Gambler chooses a player if Demon chose this player the gambler dies.
name: Gambling Addict
ability: Each night*, choose a living player (not yourself): if the demon chose this player tonight you die.

firstNightReminder: Storyteller chooses a player (different from last night) and prompts them to issue order to the doll. The Doll learns the order.
otherNightReminder: Storyteller chooses a player (different from last night) and prompts them to issue order to the doll. The Doll learns the order.
name: Doll
ability: Each night, a player (different from the last night) issues an order. You are mad till dusk that this order is good for your team and must be done or you might be executed.

firstNightReminder: The Detonator chooses a player. Put Le Bomb reminder on that player.
name: Detonator
ability: During first night, choose a player, they learn this. If they are executed, both of their neighbours die as well.

otherNightReminder: During third night the in-play demon dies and Demon Child becomes a not in-play demon. As demon they may choose tonight as order allows.
name: Demon Child
ability: On 3rd night, you become a not in-play demon, the in-play demon dies.

firstNightReminder: Shen chooses a player and a character. This player now registers as this character and his default allighnment until dusk
otherNightReminder: Shen chooses a player and a character. This player now registers as this character and his default allighnment until dusk
name: Shen
ability: Each night, choose a player (different from last night) and a character. They register as this character and his default allighnment until dusk.

firstNightReminder: The Succubus points to a player, they do not wake tonight.
otherNightReminder: The Succubus points to a player, they do not wake tonight. Previously chosen player dies.
name: Succubus
ability: Each night, choose a player, they do not wake tonight. Previously chosen player dies.

firstNightReminder: The Serpent points to a player, this player now registers as evil and a demon.
otherNightReminder: The Serpent points to a player. That player dies.
name: Serpent
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. During first night choose a player they register as evil and a demon.

otherNightReminder: The Mask points to a player. That player dies. If it would be a third death cause by the mask they die instead and another player becomes an evil mask.
name: Mask
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. On your third kill you die instead and another living player becomes an evil Mask.

firstNightReminder: The Plaguebringer chooses 2 players, they are poisoned.
otherNightReminder: One poisoned player dies then becomes healthy and one of their neighbours is poisoned.
name: Plaguebringer
ability: During 1st night: choose 2 players, they are poisoned. Each night a poisoned player dies, then becomes healthy and 1 of their living good neighbours is poisoned [-0 to -1 outsiders]
